1.Name: Apple Bat
1.Description: A bat that takes on the appearance of a black apple with a pair of wings located in Abandoned Orchard and Topple Hill.

2.Name: Forest Walker
2.Description: The Forest Walkers are hostile insects that can be found in various locations of the Frontier.

3.Name: Fantastic Dragon
3.Description: The Fantastic Dragon is a dragonkin that is supposedly transformed by the Frontier's magic and typically found in the Frontier of Dragons.

4.Name: Elite Bandit
4.Description: The Elite Bandit is an upgraded version of the Bandit that lives in Cambris.

5.Name: Hank J. Wimbleton
5.Description: A psychopathic mercenary gunman on a take-no-prisoners mission to wide out an all-powerful Agency.
5.AbilityDescription: Deathwish: Give Mag Hank to hand

6.Name: Mag Agent
6.Description: Mag Agents are A.A.H.W members who have been magnified to about two-and-a-half times their regular size.

7.Name: The Savior
7.Description: A powerful magically-augmented telekinetic weapons master.
7.AbilityDescription: Revives a fallen ally as a zombie

8.Name: Mag Hank
8.Description: Mag Hank is roughly twice his original size,has no cross on his face, a robotic looking head, and has a crustaceous-looking arm with a claw as a hand.

9.Name: Auditor
9.Description: He is also the shadowy figure behind the A.A.H.W and plots to make it an army under his control in Nevada
9.AbilityDescription: Gains +5 ATK and +5 HP when an ally dies

10.Name: Imitater
10.Description: When asked the secret to fighting zombies, Imitater replied: "...." Truly a master of his craft.
10.AbilityDescription: Warcry: Imitae Unit and its Ability and costs 3 Pt more than the targeted unit

11.Name: Seedling
11.Description: It's the tiny seed of a... nobody actually knows.
11.AbilityDescription: If it survives a turn, transform into a 1 to 6 cost unit

12.Name: Doubled Mint
12.Description: He'll grow on you. Just give him time.
12.AbilityDescription: Doubles current ATK and HP every turn

13.Name: Magnifying Grass
13.Description: Zombies may appear closer than they are.
13.AbilityDescription: Warcry: Gains +1 ATK for each point you made this turn

14.Name: Astro Vera
14.Description: Your Hero will feel out of this world. And so will your skin.
14.AbilityDescription:
Warcry: Hero Max HRT +5
Heal your hero by 1 HRT

16.Name: MiG Fighter
16.Description: The MiG Fighter is a Soviet anti-aircraft fighter used during the War of the Three Powers.

17.Name: Spy
17.Description: The spies deployed by the Allies to reconnoiter behind enemy lines and relay information back to their Allied masters.
17.AbilityDescription: Bribe an enemy unit for 15 Pt

18.Name: Stingray
18.Description: The Stingray is a Soviet amphibious vessel wielding the deadly power of electricity

19.Name: Hammer Tank
19.Description: The Hammer Tank was the main battle tank for the Soviets, equipped with a 85mm autoloading cannon and special leech beam.
19.AbilityDescription: Absorb ability of an enemy killed once

20.Name: Mirage Tank
20.Description: The Mirage Tank combines great firepower with an advanced camouflage system, making it ideal for ambushing Soviet armor divisions.

21.Name: V4 Rocket Launcher
21.Description: The V4 Rocket Launcher, also called the V4, is a powerful long range artillery.

22.Name: Dreadnought
22.Description: This vessel is armed with three separate V4 rocket launchers, which fire volleys against enemy installations and units from long range.

23.Name: Apocalypse Tank
23.Description: The Apocalypse Tank is the Soviet Union's ultraheavy battle tank equipped with two extremely powerful 125mm Drakon cannon and one Schuka magnetic harpoon
23.AbilityDescription: Deals bonus 50% damage to front units

24.Name: Kirov
24.Description: "Each Kirov is equipped with a 50-megaton bomb and it's heading to an Allied city of our choosing" - Oleg

25.Name: Giga Fortress
25.Description: The Giga fotress is the Empire's semi-sentient computer-controlled weapons flying ship that fires a sweeping laser across the battlefield.

26.Name: Future Tank X-1
26.Description: The Future Tank X-1 is an advanced battle tank available to the Allies.
26.AbilityDescription:
Spead ATK
Fire a laser that deals 25 damage to middle row enemies. (CD: 3 turns)

27.Name: Shogun Executioner
27.Description: The Shogun Executioner is an enormous advanced assault walker developed by the Empire of the Rising Sun.

28.Name: Chaos Hamsters
28.AbilityDescription: Immunity to Abilities, Status Effects and Spells

29.Name: Captain Diabetes
29.Description: "This is a job for Captain Diabetes!"
29.AbilityDescription: Doubles current ATK and HP for 2 turns (CD: 1 turn)

31.Name: Hermes Kenny
31.Description: "Nothing can stop me! I'm too fast!"

32.Name: Princess Kenny
32.AbilityDescription: Deathwish: The unit's killer has 0 ATK for 4 turns

33.Name: Inuit Kenny
33.AbilityDescription: Deathwish: Kills the enemy that kills him

34.Name: Firkle
34.Description: "I have nothing to lose in this point of my life."
34.AbilityDescription: Deathwish: All allied cards gain +5 ATK

35.Name: Youth Pastor Craig
35.AbilityDescription: Warcry: Opponent can't use spells for 3 turns

36.Name: Enforcer Jimmy
36.Description: "Dead or alive, you're coming with me."
36.AbilityDescription:
Stops front row cooldown
Disables enemy's SP ATK and SP Immunity

38.Name: Dark Angel Red
38.AbilityDescription: Warcry: Kills and revives an ally that costs 10 or less. Ally must have no self-revive

39.Name: Paladin Butters
39.AbilityDescription: Deathwish: Grants immunity to Hero for 3 turns

40.Name: Kyle of the Drow Elves
40.AbilityDescription: Invincibility to all other allies for 1 turn every 2 turns

41.Name: Dark Mage Craig
41.AbilityDescription:
Spread ATK
Warcry: Halves enemy ATK for 2 turns

42.Name: Incan Craig
42.AbilityDescription: Fires a deadly laser that pierces 20 ATK (CD: 1 turn)

43.Name: Tupperware
43.AbilityDescription: Immunity to Abilities, Status Effects and Spells

44.Name: Fastpass
44.AbilityDescription: Pierce enemy units and burn 5 ATK to victims for 2 turns

45.Name: Doctor Timothy
45.Description: "A feeble body does not hinder my ultimate mind."
45.AbilityDescription: Does 5 Dmg to the enemy at the back (CD: 1 turn)

46.Name: Shaman Token
46.AbilityDescription: Clear all negative effect from allies (CD: 2 turns)

47.Name: Rogue Token
47.AbilityDescription: Warcry: Do 8 damage to front enemies

48.Name: Woodland critters
48.AbilityDescription: Sacrifice placed card and absorb 75% of its HP and ATK

49.Name: Mr. Hankey
49.AbilityDescription: Warcry: Allied card cooldowns are reduced by 1 turn for 2 turns

50.Name: Bounty Hunter Kyle
50.AbilityDescription:
Hitting an enemy, all allies +4 ATK
killing an enemy, all allies are healed for 15 HP

53.Name: Henrietta
53.Description: "Life is pain, let me show you."
53.AbilityDescription:
When a card dies, revive that card at the cost of Henrietta losing 1/4 of its current health. 
Cannot die from power, cannot be revived

54.Name: Zen Cartman
54.Description: "I'm letting go of stress and being calm, like the buddhi."
54.AbilityDescription:
Enemies forced to attack it
Namaste!

55.Name: A.W.E.S.O.M.-O 4000
55.Description: "I have been sent from japan to serve as your personal robot."
55.AbilityDescription: Freezes an enemy unit for 1 turn (CD: 2 turns)

56.Name: Stan of Many Moons
56.AbilityDescription: Splash 10 ATK to all enemy units

60.Name: Frontier Bradley
60.Description: "Step right up, see what strikes you!"
60.AbilityDescription: Warcry: All allies gain Sweep ATK

61.Name: Mintberry Crunch
61.AbilityDescription:
Warcry: All allies are immune for 1 turn
Heals allies for 6 HP  every turn

62.Name: Sniper
62.Description: The Sniper appears as a tan skinned tower wearing a green attire and a cap, wielding a sniper rifle as its weapon with a prone stance.

63.Name: Maxed Sniper
63.Description: A level 5 sniper is the superior version of its counterpart sniper.

64.Name: Void
64.Description: The Void is the final boss encountered on Wave 40.
64.AbilityDescription: Warcry: Stuns one unit for 3 turns

65.Name: Zombie
65.Description: Zombies are hostile entities found in almost all known locations in all of the Unturned maps

66.Name: Spirit Zombie
66.Description: Spirit Zombies are translucent, faceless zombies somehow have immunity to firearms.

67.Name: Acid Zombie
67.Description: Acid Zombies will occasionally launch an acid spit towards its target, causing the target and surrounding units to be constantly damaged.
67.AbilityDescription: Splash poison 5 ATK to all enemy units for 2 turns every 1 turn

68.Name: Burner Zombie
68.Description: Burner Zombies emit a glowing orange flame and will explode upon death, causing bleed to nearby units.
68.AbilityDescription: Deathwish: Splash 5 ATK and bleed 5 ATK for 2 turns to front row enemies

69.Name: Crabby
69.Description: The Crabby is an enemy that spawns in Seaside Path, Scallop Shores, and Crabby Den.

70.Name: Scarab
70.Description: The Scarab is a horrifying boss that dwells in the Whispering Dunes.

71.Name: Servitor
71.Description: Living relics of the past Fallen civilization, Servitors are highly advanced machines that can process matter and energy into the Ether that all Fallen depend on for life
71.AbilityDescription: Grants immunity to one other ally on the battlefield

72.Name: Wyvern
72.Description: Wyverns are bipedal Vex units, with double-jointed legs ending in clawed feet and a pair of fan-like appendages wreathed in glowing blue tentacles

73.Name: Goblin
73.Description: As with all members of the Vex collective, Goblins share a single mind. This allows them to coordinate their swarming assaults on Guardians.

74.Name: Harpy
74.Description: Harpies fly rapidly in and out of combat, opening up their shells and revealing a writhing mass of filaments.

75.Name: Hobgoblin
75.Description: Hobgoblins are hardened Vex units fitted with improved optics and acute sensors in their horns
75.AbilityDescription:
Cross ATK
Burning Shield: When damaged, it is frozen and immune, heal 4 HP

76.Name: Atheon, Time's Conflux
76.Description: Atheon, Time's Conflux was a massive Vex Minotaur and the Axis Mind that oversaw the Vault of Glass on Venus.
76.AbilityDescription: Timesteam: Freezes self to send an enemy back to hand. Unable to place it back unless Atheon is unfrozen.

77.Name: Psion
77.Description: Psions are skilled marksmen, as they can use their telekinetic abilities to slow their own breathing and steady their aim.
77.AbilityDescription:
Cross ATK
Psionic Blast: Send an enemy card back to hand (CD: 2 turns)

78.Name: Raiden Shogun
78.Description: "Dear me, that didn't frighten you, did it? After all, you are in the presence of the most supreme and terrifying incarnation of lightning in the whole of Teyvat."
78.AbilityDescription: Accelerate Allies Cooldown by 1 each turn

79.Name: Ayaka
79.Description: Master of Inazuma Kamisato Art Tachi Jutsu — Kamisato Ayaka, present! Delighted to make your acquaintance.

80.Name: Zhongli
80.Description:
"Osmanthus wine tastes the same as I remember... But where 
are those who share the memory?"
80.AbilityDescription: All allies get 15 DEF for 2 turn CD: 5 turns

82.Name: Barbara
82.AbilityDescription: Heal all allies by 20% of my HP

84.Name: Bennet
84.Description: "This is your team? Cool... I like the vibe. I'm Bennett, leader of Benny's Adventure Team. Any chance we can team up? Please?"
84.AbilityDescription: Fantastic Voyage: Deal 5 Dmg to all enemies & All allies +8 HP +8 ATK (CD: 3 turns)

85.Name: Scaramouche
85.Description: "Delighted to meet you, O Mighty Traveller"

86.Name: Shouki no Kami, the Prodigal
86.Description: "Let it be known that divinity is mine."
86.AbilityDescription:
Inflict poison, burn 6 ATK & freeze for 5 turns
Setsuna Shoumetsu: Deal 40 Dmg Spread ATK (CD: 10 turns)

87.Name: Hydrogunner Legionnaire
87.Description: "It isn't time for a break yet!"

88.Name: Geo Hypostasis
88.Description: Code Name: Gimel. A high-purity Geo entity.Elemental hypostases are ultra-compact structures with a high mass.

89.Name: Cryo Hypostasis
89.Description:
Code name: Daleth. A high-purity Cryo entity. Research suggests that there are subtle differences between 
elemental hypostases and other elemental life forms in terms of their physical composition.

90.Name: Anemoboxer Vanguard
90.Description: "You can't run! Well... Neither can I."

93.Name: Pyro Slime
93.Description: Pyro Slimes are Common Enemies that are part of the Slimes enemy group and the Elemental Lifeforms family.

94.Name: Electro Slime
94.Description: Electro Slimes are Common Enemies that are part of the Slimes enemy group and the Elemental Lifeforms family.
94.AbilityDescription: All allies gain +1 ATK every turn for each unit on battlefield

95.Name: Anemo Slime
95.Description: Anemo Slimes are Common Enemies that are part of the Slimes enemy group and the Elemental Lifeforms family.
